word:
Faith 

     God's workers need faith in God. He is not unmindful of their labors. He values their work. Divine agencies 
                                                                           234
are appointed to co-operate with those who are laborers together with God. When we think that God will not do as He has said, and that He has no time to notice His workers, we dishonor our Maker.--Southern Watchman, Aug. 2, 1904.
